name: Deadly Rooms of Death: Journey to Rooted Hold
name_original: Deadly Rooms of Death: Journey to Rooted Hold
description:
Deadly Rooms of Death: Journey to Rooted Hold is a game developed by Caravel Games. It came out on 20-04-2005. It was published by Caravel Games. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Deadly Rooms of Death: Journey to Rooted Hold on PC.
